name: Eat the Moon
description:
You are hungry. Very hungry. If you don't eat the entire moon in 10 seconds, you'll starve! Play as NomNom our little space kraken on its way to eat up the moon in his endless hunger. Collect Power-ups for eating faster and gaining more time!

 We are happy to release our first game as our submission for the Mini Jam 130 Lunar.

We learned a lot in the past 3 days but could not implement all our ideas which may come in a future update.

Please leave a comment if you run into any problems.
